com.yantra.yfc.rcp.internal

Class YRCScreenHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yantra.yfc.rcp.internal.YRCScreenHandler

  • public class YRCScreenHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles Bindings, LAF, Localization, Validations, Errors etc. Interacts with YRCModelManager for handling bindings, and YRCUIExtensionHandler to manage extensibility. This class is directly created by YRCBehavior classes, and accessed by both Behavior and Extension Behaviors to provide implementation of utility methods.

      • initializeAllControls

        public void initializeAllControls(IYRCComposite ownerComposite,
                                  org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite targetComposite,
                                  java.util.Map fieldNameMap)
        This method initializes all controls on the given composite (recursively). Initializing does the following things: 1) Calls Model Manager to initialize bindings. 2) Determines the widget type. 3) Populates required maps with control information. 4) Localizes the control if required. 5) Applies Theme based on the control information.

        errorType - The error type
        errorMessage - The error message that needs to be displayed when showing the field in error.

      • showError

        public void showError()
        Message dialog showing the errors in the screen.

        This will show only one control in error at a time and the focus will go to the control in error

        For table if full row selection is provided then that row will be highlighted which is in error.
